name: The Attic Backpackers
description:
Auckland’s Top-Floor Favourite
Attic opened in 2013 and has quietly become one of the most-loved hostels in the city. We’ve welcomed over 100,000 guests from more than 140 countries (yes, we counted), and average a 9/10 rating after 6500+ reviews.

We’re perched on the top floor of a heritage building in the heart of Auckland’s CBD, near the Sky Tower, Queen Street, and everything else you’ll need on your first few days in New Zealand. With 100+ beds spread across dorms and private rooms, we’re big enough to be social but small enough to feel personal. We keep things clean, calm, and well-run — and we’ve picked up a few Hostelworld awards along the way, including Most Popular Hostel in Auckland.

Whoever you are, and wherever you come from — you’re welcome here.
We believe the most important part of any hostel isn’t the building, the bunks, or even the location — it’s the people. The travellers, the staff, the shared stories and small kindnesses that make you feel at home, even when you’re far from it.
‍
“He aha te mea nui o te ao? He tangata, he tangata, he tangata.” 
— Māori proverb

 (What is the most important thing in the world? It is people, it is people, it is people.)

groupInformation.terms: Please state the event or reason they are travelling to Auckland when making your booking.
groupInformation.cancellationTerms:
Group cancellation policy:
Inside 30-15 days outside of arrival:
A 25% cancellation charge applies for any full / part cancellation.

Inside 14 days of arrival or no shows:
A 100% cancellation charge applies for any full / part cancellation.
groupInformation.additionalTerms:
Payment policy:
30 days outside of arrival:
A 25% non refundable deposit applies.
 
14 days prior to arrival:
Full non refundable payment is required. 

Additional charges if applicable:
All group bookings must provide a valid credit card to be charged for any damages, lost keys, broken Attic house rules, damaged bedding etc. The group organiser accepts responsibility and payment for any incurred charges.

houseRules.notes:
Terms & conditions

Arrival and check-in/check-out details:

Attic's reception is open between 9 AM and 9 PM.

Check-in time is from 2.30 PM.
Guests can drop off bags in our bag room from 9 AM but need to leave the hostel and return at 2.30 PM for check-in.

If arriving in the middle of the previous night or early morning, please ensure you book the night prior and we can arrange immediate check-in for you.
It is possible to check-in after reception closes at 9 PM. We will send you an email with 'late arrival instructions' on the evening of your arrival day. Please use the free e.g. airport Wi-Fi to check for this information before arrival.

Check-out time is by 10 AM.
Please have packed all your belongings, collected all food from the kitchen and dropped off your key and pillow case at reception before 10 AM.
You will need to leave the hostel at 10 AM so our staff can clean and prepare the hostel for new guests arriving from 2:30 PM.

Guests can however still leave bags in our bag room until 4 PM but will need to leave the hostel and return to collect your bags. 
Alternatively, guests can pay a $20.00 day fee after checkout and use Attic's common areas until 6 PM. Normal checkout applies and bags still need to be left in the bag room.

Attic's cleaning and housekeeping teams work between 8.30 AM and 2 PM to ensure all guests can enjoy a clean hostel and rooms. Please help our team by checking out on time and letting them clean each area quickly and efficiently eg the kitchen is closed for cleaning between 10-12 noon. We work hard to ensure all guests can enjoy a clean hostel by 2.30 pm checkin time. Thank you for respecting this policy.

Cancellation Policy:
Any cancellations made within 72 hours will be charged 100%.

Terms:
Please note there is 3% credit card fee on all credit or foreign cards.
Photo ID required. Either Driving license or International passport ONLY.
All guests must have a credit/debit card to stay at Attic which will be held on file as a bond and will be charged for lost keys, broken hostel rule fines or damage.
Guests aged 10+ accepted. Guests aged 10-18 must reserve/reside in private dormitories or private rooms (Double, Twin). Guests aged 10-18 will not be permitted to share dormitories with persons other than the members of their booking party. Guests aged 10-18 must be accompanied by a responsible adult (Aged 25+) at all times.
All guests are encouraged to keep the hostel safe and secure for fellow guests.

Attic is a social but not a party hostel and quiet time after 11 PM is requested in the hostel so other guests can sleep. As such, we do allow a social drink of BYO alcohol to be consumed on site but please consume responsibly, follow the House Rules and/or the requirements of Attic Team Members when prompted.
No curfew applies and there are plenty of local bars and entertainment areas nearby due to our CBD location.

Attic is proud of our close relationship with Hostelworld and we look forward to hosting you.

categories.category_description: This hostel has confirmed that they have implemented a sustainability strategy that will lead them to certification. They’ve committed to prioritising environmental, cultural and community best practices. They may also meet a Global Sustainable Tourism Council recognised standard.
